courses.title: Music Theory for Beginners
courses.description: Start your journey with the fundamentals of rhythm, melody, and harmony.
courses.longDescription: This comprehensive course is designed to build a solid foundation in music theory. You will learn to read sheet music, understand scales and modes, and grasp the core concepts of harmony and rhythm. Whether you play piano, guitar, or just want to understand the language of music, this course is your starting point.
courses.instructorBio: Aravind Kumar is a classically trained pianist with over 15 years of teaching experience. He holds a Master's degree in Music Theory from the Royal College of Music.

courses.title: Advanced Composition Techniques
courses.description: Master complex orchestration and emotive storytelling through sound.
courses.longDescription: Take your compositions to the next level with advanced techniques in orchestration, counterpoint, and arranging. Learn how to analyze scores and apply sophisticated textures to your own work.
courses.instructorBio: Shreya Malhotra is a film composer whose work has been featured in award-winning independent films. She specializes in orchestral textures and hybrid scoring.

courses.title: The Art of Songwriting
courses.description: Learn to write compelling lyrics and memorable melodies.
courses.longDescription: Unlock your creative potential and find your unique voice. This course covers lyric writing structures, prosody, melody development, and overcoming writer's block.
courses.instructorBio: Isha Nair is a chart-topping songwriter who has penned hits for major pop artists. She focuses on the emotional connection of songs.

reviews.comment: My lyrics have improved so much.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Produce professional tracks using the latest DAW techniques.
courses.longDescription: Dive deep into the world of electronic music production. Learn sound design, synthesis, sampling, and mixing workflow in Ableton Live and Logic Pro.
courses.instructorBio: Chirag Mehta is a touring DJ and producer known for his deep house and techno tracks. He brings 10 years of industry experience.

reviews.comment: The synthesis module alone is worth the price.

courses.title: Piano Mastery: Basic to Pro
courses.description: A complete guide to mastering the keys.
courses.longDescription: From reading music to improvisation, this course covers it all. Designed for those who want to master the piano with proper technique and expression.
courses.instructorBio: Sangeeta Rao is a concert pianist and dedicated educator. She emphasizes proper technique to prevent injury and maximize expression.

courses.title: Mixing & Mastering Essentials
courses.description: Polish your tracks to industry standards.
courses.longDescription: Learn the art of mixing. Balance your tracks, apply EQ, compression, and effects to create a polished, radio-ready sound.
courses.instructorBio: Chirag Mehta is also an expert mixing engineer, having mixed hundreds of tracks for independent artists.

courses.title: Lyricism & Storytelling
courses.description: Craft lyrics that resonate and tell powerful stories.
courses.longDescription: Focus purely on the words. Learn how to tell stories that captivate listeners and create emotional resonance through your lyrics.
courses.instructorBio: Isha Nair believes that every word matters. Her simplified approach to storytelling makes complex emotions accessible.

reviews.comment: Good tips on overcoming writer's block.

courses.title: Orchestration Styles
courses.description: Explore different styles of orchestral arrangement.
courses.longDescription: A comparative study of orchestration styles from the Baroque era to modern film scoring. Understand how to arrange for different ensembles.
courses.instructorBio: Shreya Malhotra brings her academic background to this deep dive into historical and modern orchestration.
